Container.Name: neolink-ui
Container.Overview: Web UI for managing Neolink - a Reolink camera bridge that converts Baichuan protocol to RTSP/MQTT. Configure cameras, manage streams, and control the neolink process through a browser interface.
Container.Description: Neolink UI provides a web-based management interface for the neolink camera bridge. Features include camera configuration, RTSP user management, MQTT setup, and process control.

Config.Name: Config File
Config.Description: Path to neolink TOML configuration file

Config.Name: UI Password
Config.Description: Password for the web UI (leave empty to disable authentication)

Config.Name: Neolink Mode
Config.Description: Neolink operating mode: rtsp or mqtt
